content.title: Spirtuality
content.description: We all have big questions, and exploring big answers can feel overwhelming—or just weird. Check out some stories from people exploring spirituality at The Meeting House.

image1.alt: Man standing in front of a large chalkboard at the front of a lecture hall at a university.
Man sitting on the steps infront of a university building.

content.text1: We all have big questions, and exploring big answers can feel overwhelming—or just weird. We've pulled together a few stories to share our experiences with you. Full disclosure: we think the best thing we have to offer is to point you towards Jesus.

As God on earth, Jesus came to show us God's love, save us from sin, set up God's kingdom, and shut down religion so we can share in God's life together. Starting to ask questions about spirituality and faith? We think Jesus is the best place to start.
Short videos that are a great starting point if you are interested in some of the basics when it comes to Jesus, God, and spirituality.
Dive a little deeper than our starting questions and check out some of the most popular questions we've received.
Exploring spirituality isn't a journey you have to take on your own—we're meant to do this together! Want to connect with other people who are asking similar questions?
